title: CV
text:
Research Stays


    
        Blosc Development Team, Castelló de la Plana, Spain (Feb 2021 - Sept 2021)
        Host: Francesc Alted
        Develop two codecs for Blosc using AA and fuzzy k-means.
    
    
        Technical University of Denmark (DTU), Lyngby, Denmark (Oct 2023 - Dec 2023)
        Host: Morten Mørup
        Extend AA to n dimensions along with other minor extensions.
    
    
        Technical University of Denmark (DTU), Lyngby, Denmark (Oct 2024 - Dec 2024)
        Host: Morten Mørup
        Extend AA to n dimensions along with other minor extensions.

title: Research
text:
Alcacer, Aleix and Epifanio, Irene (2024). Outlier detection of clustered functional data with image and signal processing applications by archetype analysis. PLOS ONE. 10.1371/journal.pone.0311418

        2024 JIF: 18.6 (Q1 in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence)

title: Aleix Alcacer Sales
text:
I am a passionate postdoctoral researcher at Jaume I University, deeply immersed in the vibrant world of Open Source. My enthusiasm lies in developing innovative algorithms, with a keen focus on optimizing both performance and efficiency.
At present, my research endeavors are centered around crafting novel methods in the fascinating field of archetypal analysis.
View my complete CV.
 
  
   
  
      GitHub
  
  
      Orcid
  
  
      Twitter
  
  
      LinkedIn
  
  
      Email

title: Aleix Alcacer Sales
text:
Interests


  Archetypal Analysis
  Machine Learning
  Data Visualisation
  Reinforcement Learning
  HPC and Software Optimization
  Knowledge Sharing
